// Component

.bookmark
  // position: absolute
  // top: 170px
  // right: 0
  text-align: center
  background-color: $brand-primary
  width: 50px
  border-bottom-left-radius: 15px
  font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed

    .bookmark__text
      display: block
      padding: 5px 10px

.bookmark__link,
.bookmark__link:hover,
.bookmark__link:visited
  color: #fff
  text-decoration: none

.bookmark__text
  display: none
  +breakpoint(lg-desktop)
    display: block
    padding: 5px 10px

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative
  padding: 20px
  margin-bottom: 30px
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-h4
  overflow: hidden
  & > *
    z-index: 2
    position: relative
  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter
  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base
      text-decoration: none
  strong
    color: $brand-primary
  select
    background-color: #fff
  p:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute
  left: 10px
  top: 50%
  margin: -85px 0
  color: $gray-lighter
  z-index: 1
  font-weight: 600
  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px
  img
    width: 100%

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto
    right: -50px

.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px
  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px

.box--small
  padding-top: 10px
  padding-bottom: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
  font-size: $font-size-base
  strong
    color: $gray-base

.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden
  position: relative

.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark

.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%
  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left
  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px
    padding: 0 20px
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px
      border: none
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0

.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base
    border-color: $gray-base
    color: #fff
  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter
    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter
  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0
    margin: 0
    border: none
    .contact
      padding: 0
      border: none
  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light
    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff
  a
    color: #fff
  strong
    color: #fff

.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

sections.description:
Widget whith date and circular diagram how much time is left. Based on example http://codepen.io/rendro/pen/qazCG. Informations are shown horizontally or vertically to not take up unnecessary space on mobile devices depending on width of wrapping element. See example below how it works inside a bootstrap collumn (marked with dashed border). Resize browser window to see the differences.

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative
  text-transform: uppercase
  color: $gray-base
  overflow: hidden
  text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static
  width: 60px
  height: 60px
  padding-top: 0
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px
  line-height: 26px
  canvas
    position: absolute
    left: 0
    top: 0

.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6
  height: 60px
  line-height: 60px
  text-align: center
  display: block
  font-weight: bold

.counter__label
  position: absolute
  top: 10px
  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

.counter__caption
  position: absolute
  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center
  .counter__pie
    position: relative
    width: auto
    width: 120px
    height: 120px
    margin-bottom: 5px
  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px
    font-size: $font-size-h1
    font-weight: 700
    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2
  .counter__label
    top: 70px
    left: 0
    right: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
  .counter__caption
    position: static
    top: auto
    left: auto
    font-size: $font-size-small
    br
      display: inline

.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px
  margin: 0 10px 10px
  float: left

.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0
      left: 0
      right: 0
      line-height: 120px
      font-size: $font-size-h3
      font-weight: bold
    .counter__left
      display: none

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured
  display: table
  width: 100%
  padding-left: 0
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.featured__item
  display: table-row
  vertical-align: middle
  &:not(:last-child)
    .featured__text,
    .featured__icon
      border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-lighter

.featured__text
  display: table-cell
  padding: 15px 20px

.featured__icon
  display: table-cell
  vertical-align: middle

.featured__circle
  width: 30px
  height: 30px
  float: right
  +circle($brand-primary)
  .icon
    +icon-size(30px)
    color: #fff

sections.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
sections.css:
$waat-icons-font-path: "../images/fonts/waat-icons"

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")


.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 200%
  display: inline-block
  width: 0.5em
  height: 0
  line-height: 0
  vertical-align: text-bottom
  position: relative
  &:before
    position: absolute
    left: -0.25em
    bottom: 0.33em

sections.css:
$listing-media-width: 160px

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing
  margin-bottom: 20px


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  padding-bottom: 30px
  padding-top: 30px
  overflow: hidden
  &:last-child
    padding-bottom: 0
    border-bottom: none

  p
    margin: 0
    text-align: justify


.listing__item-column-second
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  text-align: center


.listing__item-text
  overflow: hidden


.listing__item-title
  margin-top: 0
  a
    color: $gray-base

  h2, h3
    margin: 0 !important



.listing__item-meta
  font-size: $font-size-small
  color: $gray-light
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  display: block


.listing__item-footer
  margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2
  overflow: hidden


.listing__icon
  color: $brand-primary
  font-size: $font-size-large
  position: relative
  top: 2px


+breakpoint(phone)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: left
    margin-right: 30px
    max-width: $listing-media-width
    overflow: hidden

    .listing__item-media-icon
      width: 40px
      height: 40px
      background-color: $gray-lightest
      text-align: center
      .icon
        +icon-size(40px)
        margin-top: -6px

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--column-second-above
  .listing__item-column-second
    max-width: none
    float: none
    margin-right: 0
    margin-bottom: 20px
    width: 100%
    img
      width: 100%

.listing--column-sec-above-md
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: none

.listing--zebra
  .listing__item:nth-of-type(even)
    background-color: $gray-lightest

.listing--no-separators
  .listing__item
    border-bottom: none
    padding-bottom: 0


// Numbered listing

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--numbered
  counter-reset: listing--numbered
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 10px, 50px)
    margin: 35px 0 15px 80px
    padding-bottom: 0
    position: relative
    overflow: visible
    border-bottom: none

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 55px
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed
    &:before
      content: counter(listing--numbered)
      counter-increment: listing--numbered
      position: absolute
      left: -80px
      top: 50%
      width: 80px
      height: 60px
      margin: -30px 0
      text-align: center
      font-size: $font-size-h1 * 4/5

    p:not(:last-child)
      margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2


  .listing__item-title
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 3

  .listing__item-footer
    background-color: $gray-lightest
    padding: 0 10px 0 35px
    a, button
      color: $brand-primary

.listing--numbered.listing--condensed
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 5px, 10px)
    padding: 5px 10px 5px 0
    margin: 5px 0 5px 30px

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 30px
    margin-bottom: 0
    &:before
      left: -30px
      width: 30px
      height: 20px
      margin: -20px 0
      font-size: $font-size-large
      text-align: left


// Notifications listing
//

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table
  list-style-type: none
  padding: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell
  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: $gray-base
    .icon
      display: none

.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight
  color: $gray-base

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative
  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    font-size: $font-size-small
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 1px 0 0
    width: 215px
    margin-left: -72px
    top: 91px
    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary
    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0
      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0
    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px
      text-decoration: none
      &:hover
        background: none
    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff
    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary
      top: 0
      left: 100%
      margin-top: 0
      margin-left: -1px
      border: none
      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary
        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary
    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block

// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px

• First item
  • Second item
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 0
  margin: 0
  list-style-type: none

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block
  padding-bottom: 0

.nav-tiles__link
  display: block

.nav-tiles__label
  display: block

.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0
  position: relative
  display: inline-block
  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute
    margin: -17px
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: $gray-base
    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left
    overflow: hidden
    color: #fff
    text-transform: uppercase
    height: 50px
    line-height: 50px
    padding: 0 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0

+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table
    width: 100%
    table-layout: fixed
  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none
    display: table-cell
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center


@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block
    margin-left: auto
    margin-right: auto
    float: none
  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px
  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 10px 0
    .icon
      margin: -19.5px
      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle
    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table
      width: 100%
      height: 70px
      line-height: $line-height-computed
  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell
    vertical-align: middle
  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px
    max-height: 70px
    overflow: hidden


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none
  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))

sections.description: Live ribbon to display text label on box or image in attractive way
sections.markup: Live
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute
  top: -5px
  left: -5px
  width: 85px
  height: 85px
  overflow: hidden


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.live__container
  position: relative

.live__inner
  background-color: $red
  text-align: center
  text-transform: uppercase
  padding: 3px 0
  width: 120px
  left: -27px
  top: 21px
  position: relative
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  color: #fff
  transform: rotate(-45deg)
  box-shadow: 1px 1px 1px $gray-light
  &:before,
  &:after
    content: ''
    border-top: 4px solid $gray-base
    border-left: 4px solid transparent
    border-right: 4px solid transparent
    position: absolute
    bottom: -4px
  &:before
    left: 0
  &:after
    right: 0

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table
  width: 100%

.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667

.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell

.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px
  padding: 0 20px 0 0
  text-align: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px
    text-align: right
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0


.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px

.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  position: relative
  &:before
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 20px
    height: 20px
    position: absolute
    top: 1px
    left: -10px
    background-color: $brand-primary
    border: 6px #fff solid
    border-radius: 50%

.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  margin: 0
  text-transform: uppercase

.timeline__description
  width: 100%
  padding-bottom: 20px
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  margin-bottom: 20px
  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3
    &:last-child
      margin: 0

// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none
  .timeline__description
    border: none
    padding: 0


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light

.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__legend .label-default
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  white-space: normal

sections.description: White stripe for smaller content
sections.markup: Switch me
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px
  line-height: 30px
  display: inline-block
  float: left
  margin-right: 10px
.switch__label
  cursor: pointer
  width: 60px
  height: 30px
  position: relative
  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    position: absolute
    background: $gray-lighter
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out
    border-radius: 15px
  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff
    height: 28px
    left: 1px
    top: 1px
    position: absolute
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out
    width: 30px
    border-radius: 50%
    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'
    font-size: 10px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 27px
    letter-spacing: -2px
    text-indent: -1px
    color: $gray-lighter

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none
  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $green
      opacity: 1
    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px
sections.renderMarkup: Switch me

sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  background-color: #0d66a0
  font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif
  overflow: visible

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header__top
  background-color: #fff
  padding-top: 5px
  height: 50px
  #boxes-box-header_top_text
    color: #0065a2
    margin-top: 20px
    text-transform: uppercase
    font-size: 18px
    font-weight: 400

.section--header__bottom
  #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    color: #fff
    font-size: 13px
    font-weight: 400
    margin: 5px 0

.section--header__breadcrumb
    background-color: #074A8B
    padding: 3px 0 2px

.section--header__logo
    display: block
    width: 90px
    height: 62px
    background: url("../images/svg/ec-logo.svg") no-repeat
    margin: 0 10px 0 0
    position: relative
    z-index: 1

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .section--header__top
    height: auto
    #boxes-box-header_top_text
      margin-top: 60px
      font-size: 24px
  .section--header__logo
    width: 172px
    height: 118px
    margin: 10px 35px -35px 0
  .section--header__bottom #boxes-box-header_bottom_text
    margin: 5px 0 20px 208px
    font-size: 16px

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.section--header
  .nav-horizontal
    margin: 0 0 -30px
    .nav-horizontal__item
      font-size: 11px
      font-weight: normal
      border-right: 1px #4677a8 solid
      line-height: 1em
      padding: 0 3px 0 0 !important
      margin: 0 !important
      &:last-of-type
        padding: 0
        margin: 0
        border-right: 0

    .nav-horizontal__link
      &,
      &:hover,
      &:focus
        color: #396ea2

.section--header__breadcrumb
  .breadcrumb
    background-color: transparent
    color: #fff
    border-radius: 0
    font-size: 0
    font-weight: normal
    margin: 0
    padding: 0
  .breadcrumb ol

  .breadcrumb li
    font-size: 11px
    margin: 0

  .breadcrumb li > a
    color: #fff
    &:hover,
    &:focus
      color: #fff

  .breadcrumb > li + li:before
    content: ' > '
    font-size: 8px
    padding: 0 3px 0 1px
    color: #fff

  .breadcrumb > .active
    color: #fff

sections.css:
$popover-width: 230px

// Demo wrapper styling
.popover-demo
  margin: 150px 0 20px
  text-align: center

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__inner
  position: absolute !important
  bottom: 100%
  left: 50%
  width: $popover-width
  margin: 0 0 40px -35px
  padding: 20px
  box-sizing: border-box
  display: none
  background-color: #fff
  border-radius: 7px
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-computed
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  box-shadow: $gray-lighter 2px 0 0
  +arrow($gray-lighter, #fff, "bottom", "out", 15px, 20px)

.popover__title
  font-size: 18px
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  margin-bottom: 12px

.popover__overlay
  position: fixed
  top: 0
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  display: none
  z-index: 100
  background-color: transparentize($gray-base, 0.8)

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover--left
  .popover__inner
    margin-left: -$popover-width+35px
    &::before
      left: auto
      right: 20px
    &::after
      left: auto
      right: 19px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover.is-open
  .popover__overlay
    display: block
    animation:
      name: popover-overlay
      duration: 500ms
      timing-function: ease-in-out
      iteration-count: 1
      fill-mode: forwards
  .popover__inner
    display: block
    transform-origin: bottom left
    animation:
      name: popover-inner
      duration: 500ms
      timing-function: ease-in-out
      iteration-count: 1
      fill-mode: forwards

@keyframes popover-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    bottom: 25%
    transform: scale(0.05) rotate(30deg) rotateX(-90deg)
  50%
    transform: rotate(-10deg) rotateX(-2deg)
  70%
    transform: rotate(3deg)
  100%
    opacity: 1
    bottom: 100%
    transform: scale(1)


@keyframes popover-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1
sections.renderMarkup:

sections.description: Button in various versions.
sections.markup: Button
sections.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn
  background: transparent
  padding: 7px 20px 9px
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  font-size: $font-size-base
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
  border: 2px solid
  border-radius: 20px
  white-space: nowrap
  cursor: pointer
  +btn-color($text-color)
  &:hover
    transition: color 250ms, border-color 250ms, background 250ms
    +btn-color(#fff, $text-color, $text-color)

button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="submit"]
  @extend .btn
  margin-top: 30px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--block
  width: 100%
  display: block
  max-width: none
  text-align: center

.btn--md
  padding: 11px 25px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--lg
  padding: 15px 25px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--circle
  width: 48px
  height: 48px
  line-height: 48px
  padding: 0
  margin: -14px 0
  display: inline-block
  text-align: center
  border-radius: 50%
  +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
  &:hover
    +btn-color(#fff, $gray-base, $gray-base)

.btn--light
  +btn-color(#fff, #fff)
  &:hover
    +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--primary
  +btn-color(#fff, $brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--link
  border: none
  padding-left: 0
  padding-right: 0
  +btn-color($brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    text-decoration: underline

.btn--disabled
  pointer-events: none
  opacity: 0.2


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--circle > .icon::before
  bottom: 0.40em
  right: -0.18em
  +icon-size(23px)
sections.renderMarkup: Button

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  position: relative
  padding: 20px
  margin-bottom: 30px
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-h4
  overflow: hidden
  & > *
    z-index: 2
    position: relative
  .btn .icon
    color: $brand-primary
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-lighter
  a
    &:hover,
    &:active,
    &:focus
      color: $gray-base
      text-decoration: none
  strong
    color: $brand-primary
  select
    background-color: #fff
  p:last-child
    margin-bottom: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.box__bg
  position: absolute
  left: 10px
  top: 50%
  margin: -85px 0
  color: $gray-lighter
  z-index: 1
  font-weight: 600
  +icon-size(170px)

.box__media
  margin: 0 -20px -20px
  img
    width: 100%

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.box--icon-to-right
  .box__bg
    left: auto
    right: -50px

.box--half-icon
  &:not(.box--icon-to-right) .box__bg
    left: -50px
  &.box--icon-to-right .box__bg
    right: -105px

.box--small
  padding-top: 10px
  padding-bottom: 10px
  margin-bottom: 10px
  font-size: $font-size-base
  strong
    color: $gray-base

.box--show-more__wrapper
  overflow: hidden
  position: relative

.box--brand-primary
  background-color: $brand-primary
  color: #fff
  .box__bg
    color: $brand-primary-dark

.box--arrow-bottom
  +arrow($brand-primary, $brand-primary, "bottom", "out", 15px, 110px)
  overflow: visible

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.box
  .middle-align
    width: 100%
  .middle-align__col
    text-align: left
  .listing__header
    margin: -20px -20px 20px
    padding: 0 20px
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    .listing__header-title
      margin: 10px 0 5px
      border: none
  h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6
    margin-top: 0

.box--brand-primary
  .btn .icon
    color: #fff
  .btn-default
    background-color: $gray-base
    border-color: $gray-base
    color: #fff
  // Dependency on .contact component
  .contact__icon
    color: $brand-primary-lighter
    border-color: $brand-primary-lighter
  .contact__row
    padding-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
  &.contact--listing
    padding: 15px 15px 0
    margin: 0
    border: none
    .contact
      padding: 0
      border: none
  // Dependency on .listung component
  .listing__header
    background-color: $brand-primary-dark
    border-bottom: 1px solid $brand-primary-light
    .listing__header-title
      color: #fff
  a
    color: #fff
  strong
    color: #fff

.box--light
  background-color: $almost-white

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter
  position: relative
  text-transform: uppercase
  color: $gray-base
  overflow: hidden
  text-align: left

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter__pie
  position: static
  width: 60px
  height: 60px
  padding-top: 0
  vertical-align: middle
  font-size: $font-size-small - 3px
  line-height: 26px
  canvas
    position: absolute
    left: 0
    top: 0

.counter__left
  font-size: $font-size-h3 + 6
  height: 60px
  line-height: 60px
  text-align: center
  display: block
  font-weight: bold

.counter__label
  position: absolute
  top: 10px
  left: 75px
  font-weight: 600
  line-height: 26px
  font-size: $font-size-base

.counter__caption
  position: absolute
  left: 75px
  top: 34px
  font-size: $font-size-small - 2
  br
    display: none

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.counter.is-big
  text-align: center
  .counter__pie
    position: relative
    width: auto
    width: 120px
    height: 120px
    margin-bottom: 5px
  .counter__left
    padding-top: 40px
    font-size: $font-size-h1
    font-weight: 700
    line-height: $line-height-computed + 2
  .counter__label
    top: 70px
    left: 0
    right: 0
    font-size: $font-size-small - 3
  .counter__caption
    position: static
    top: auto
    left: auto
    font-size: $font-size-small
    br
      display: inline

.counter--fixed-big
  width: 120px
  margin: 0 10px 10px
  float: left

.counter--open
  &.counter.is-big
    .counter__label
      top: 0
      left: 0
      right: 0
      line-height: 120px
      font-size: $font-size-h3
      font-weight: bold
    .counter__left
      display: none

section.description: Set of WAAT icons for any occasion. Since icons are fonts, they can be placed anywhere where text is placed and are sized automatically to match the surrounding child. Color of the icon might be declared same way as for text.
section.css:
$waat-icons-font-path: "../images/fonts/waat-icons"

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Import the fonts
@font-face
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot")
  src: url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.eot?#iefix") format("embedded-opentype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.woff") format("woff"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.ttf") format("truetype"), url("#{$waat-icons-font-path}.svg#icomoon") format("svg")


.icon
  font-family: 'WAAT Icons'
  speak: none
  font-style: normal
  font-weight: normal
  font-variant: normal
  text-transform: none
  // Better Font Rendering
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale
  // To small icons fix.
  font-size: 200%
  display: inline-block
  width: 0.5em
  height: 0
  line-height: 0
  vertical-align: text-bottom
  position: relative
  &:before

    left: -0.25em

section.css:
$listing-media-width: 160px

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing
  margin-bottom: 20px


// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing__item
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  padding-bottom: 30px
  padding-top: 30px
  overflow: hidden
  &:last-child
    padding-bottom: 0
    border-bottom: none

  p
    margin: 0
    text-align: justify


.listing__item-column-second
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  text-align: center


.listing__item-text
  overflow: hidden


.listing__item-title
  margin-top: 0
  a
    color: $gray-base

  h2, h3
    margin: 0 !important



.listing__item-meta
  font-size: $font-size-small
  color: $gray-light
  width: 100%
  margin-bottom: 10px
  display: block


.listing__item-footer
  margin-top: $line-height-computed / 2
  overflow: hidden


.listing__icon
  color: $brand-primary
  font-size: $font-size-large
  position: relative
  top: 2px


+breakpoint(phone)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: left
    margin-right: 30px
    max-width: $listing-media-width
    overflow: hidden

    .listing__item-media-icon
      width: 40px
      height: 40px
      background-color: $gray-lightest
      text-align: center
      .icon
        +icon-size(40px)
        margin-top: -6px

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--column-second-above
  .listing__item-column-second
    max-width: none
    float: none
    margin-right: 0
    margin-bottom: 20px
    width: 100%
    img
      width: 100%

.listing--column-sec-above-md
  +breakpoint(tablet, tablet)
  .listing__item-column-second
    float: none

.listing--zebra
  .listing__item:nth-of-type(even)
    background-color: $gray-lightest

.listing--no-separators
  .listing__item
    border-bottom: none
    padding-bottom: 0


// Numbered listing

section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.listing--numbered
  counter-reset: listing--numbered
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 10px, 50px)
    margin: 35px 0 15px 80px
    padding-bottom: 0
    position: relative
    overflow: visible
    border-bottom: none

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 55px
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed
    &:before
      content: counter(listing--numbered)
      counter-increment: listing--numbered
      position: absolute
      left: -80px
      top: 50%
      width: 80px
      height: 60px
      margin: -30px 0
      text-align: center
      font-size: $font-size-h1 * 4/5

    p:not(:last-child)
      margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2


  .listing__item-title
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 2
    font-size: $font-size-h3 + 3

  .listing__item-footer
    background-color: $gray-lightest
    padding: 0 10px 0 35px
    a, button
      color: $brand-primary

.listing--numbered.listing--condensed
  .listing__item
    +arrow($gray-light, #fff, 'left', 'in', 5px, 10px)
    padding: 5px 10px 5px 0
    margin: 5px 0 5px 30px

  .listing__item-text
    padding-left: 30px
    margin-bottom: 0
    &:before
      left: -30px
      width: 30px
      height: 20px
      margin: -20px 0
      font-size: $font-size-large
      text-align: left


// Notifications listing
//

  • Manage your contact

  • Help your clients
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles
  display: table
  list-style-type: none
  padding: 0

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  display: table-cell
  &:not(:last-child) .nav-sectiontitles__link
    padding-right: 30px

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item
  & > .nav-sectiontitles__link,
  & > * > .nav-sectiontitles__link
    font-family: $font-family-sans-condensed
    text-transform: uppercase
    color: $gray-base
    .icon
      display: none

.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item .nav-sectiontitles__link
  font-weight: $font-weight
  color: $gray-base

// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-sectiontitles .dropdown
  position: relative
  .dropdown-menu
    position: absolute !important
    background-color: $gray-lighter
    font-size: $font-size-small
    border-radius: 0
    padding: 1px 0 0
    width: 215px
    margin-left: -72px
    top: 91px
    border-bottom: 10px solid $brand-primary
    .nav-sectiontitles__item
      padding-bottom: 0
      &:not(:last-child)
        border-bottom: 1px solid $gray-light
      .dropdown
        padding: 15px 0
    .nav-sectiontitles__link
      padding: 15px 20px
      text-decoration: none
      &:hover
        background: none
    .nav-sectiontitles__item:hover
      background-color: $brand-primary
      font-weight: $headings-font-weight
      .nav-sectiontitles__link
        color: #fff
    // Deeper dropdown level.
    .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
      background-color: $brand-primary
      top: 0
      left: 100%
      margin-top: 0
      margin-left: -1px
      border: none
      .nav-sectiontitles__item
        border-color: $brand-primary
        &:hover
          background-color: $brand-primary
    .dropdown:hover>.dropdown-menu
      display: block

// Deeeper level of last item displayed at left instead of right.
.nav-sectiontitles .nav-sectiontitles__item:last-child .dropdown-menu .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  left: -100%

.nav-sectiontitles > .nav-sectiontitles__item > .dropdown > .dropdown-menu
  +arrow($gray-light, $gray-lighter, "top", "out", 10px, 102px)

.nav-sectiontitles .ornament:before
  margin-bottom: 5px
section.renderMarkup:

  • Manage your contact
  • Promote the network
  • Help your clients

section.description: Justified, fully responsive navigation with icons. Menu becomes horizontal on phone devices.
section.markup:
• First item
  • Second item
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles
  background-color: $brand-primary
  padding: 0
  margin: 0
  list-style-type: none

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles__item
  display: block
  padding-bottom: 0

.nav-tiles__link
  display: block

.nav-tiles__label
  display: block

.nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
  float: left
  width: 40px
  height: 40px
  margin: 5px 20px 5px 0
  position: relative
  display: inline-block
  +circle($brand-primary-light)
  .icon
    position: absolute
    margin: -17px
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: $gray-base
    +icon-size(35px)

.nav-tiles__item
  &:not(:last-child)
    border-bottom: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__link
    text-align: left
    overflow: hidden
    color: #fff
    text-transform: uppercase
    height: 50px
    line-height: 50px
    padding: 0 20px
    margin: 0
    border-radius: 0

+breakpoint(tablet)
  .nav-tiles
    display: table
    width: 100%
    table-layout: fixed
  .nav-tiles__item
    border-bottom: none
    display: table-cell
    &:not(:last-child)
      border-right: 1px solid lighten($brand-primary-light, 5%)
  .nav-tiles__label
    text-align: center


@media (min-width: $screen-sm-min) and (max-width: $screen-sm-max)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    display: block
    margin-left: auto
    margin-right: auto
    float: none
  .nav-tiles__item .nav-tiles__link
    height: 80px
  .nav-tiles__label
    line-height: $line-height-computed

+breakpoint(desktop)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 10px 0
    .icon
      margin: -19.5px
      +icon-size(40px)
  .nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item
    vertical-align: middle
    .nav-tiles__link
      display: table
      width: 100%
      height: 70px
      line-height: $line-height-computed
  .nav-tiles__icon-collumn,
  .nav-tiles__label-collumn
    display: table-cell
    vertical-align: middle
  .nav-tiles__label
    padding: 0 10px
    max-height: 70px
    overflow: hidden


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:hover,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link:focus,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__link.active,
.nav-tiles .nav-tiles__item.active-trail
  text-decoration: none
  background-color: darken($brand-primary, 6%)
  .nav-tiles__icon-wrapper
    +circle(darken($brand-primary-light, 4%))
section.renderMarkup:
• First item
  • Second item

$social-links-size: 60px

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.social-links

  text-align: center
  margin-left: 35px

.social-links__item
  line-height: $social-links-size * 2 / 3

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.live
  position: absolute
  top: -5px
  left: -5px
  width: 85px
  height: 85px

.live__container
  position: relative

.live__inner
  background-color: $red

  width: 120px
  left: -27px
  top: 21px

  &:after
    right: 0

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item,
.timeline__legend
  display: table
  width: 100%

.timeline__legend
  margin-bottom: $line-height-computed * 0.667

.timeline__time,
.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-time,
.timeline__legend-text,
  display: table-cell

.timeline__time,
.timeline__legend-time
  width: 70px
  padding: 0 20px 0 0
  text-align: left
  +breakpoint(tablet)
    width: 125px
    text-align: right
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 40px 0 0


.timeline__text,
.timeline__legend-text
  padding: 0 0 0 20px
  +breakpoint(desktop)
    padding: 0 0 0 40px

.timeline__text
  border-left: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  position: relative
  &:before
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 20px
    height: 20px
    position: absolute
    top: 1px
    left: -10px
    background-color: $brand-primary
    border: 6px #fff solid
    border-radius: 50%

.timeline__title
  font-size: $font-size-large
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  margin: 0
  text-transform: uppercase

.timeline__description
  width: 100%
  padding-bottom: 20px
  border-bottom: 1px $gray-lighter solid
  margin-bottom: 20px
  p
    margin-bottom: $line-height-computed / 3
    &:last-child
      margin: 0

// Last item styling
.timeline__item:last-of-type
  .timeline__text
    border: none
  .timeline__description
    border: none
    padding: 0


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__item--past
  &, .timeline__title
    color: $gray-light
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $gray-light

.timeline__item--now
  .timeline__time
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  .timeline__text:before
    background-color: $yellow


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.timeline__legend .label-default
  background-color: $gray-lighter
  font-size: $font-size-xsmall
  white-space: normal

section.description: White stripe for smaller content
section.markup: Switch me
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__legend
  height: 30px
  line-height: 30px
  display: inline-block
  float: left
  margin-right: 10px
.switch__label
  cursor: pointer
  width: 60px
  height: 30px
  position: relative
  &:before
    // Coloured background.
    content: ''
    display: block
    width: 100%
    height: 100%
    position: absolute
    background: $gray-lighter
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)
    transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out
    border-radius: 15px
  &:after
    // Dot.
    background: #fff
    height: 28px
    left: 1px
    top: 1px
    position: absolute
    transition: all 0.3s ease-in-out
    width: 30px
    border-radius: 50%
    // Inside dot.
    content: '|||'
    font-size: 10px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 27px
    letter-spacing: -2px
    text-indent: -1px
    color: $gray-lighter

// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.switch__input
  display: none
  &:checked
    & + label:before
      // Coloured background.
      background: $green
      opacity: 1
    & + label:after
      // Dot.
      left: 29px
section.renderMarkup: Switch me

section.markup:
Open popover
Popover title
Popover content
section.css:
$popover-width: 230px

// Demo wrapper styling
.popover-demo
  margin: 150px 0 20px
  text-align: center

// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover
  position: relative
  display: inline-block

// Elements
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover__inner
  position: absolute !important
  bottom: 100%
  left: 50%
  width: $popover-width
  margin: 0 0 40px -35px
  padding: 20px
  box-sizing: border-box
  display: none
  background-color: #fff
  border-radius: 7px
  text-align: left
  text-transform: none
  line-height: $line-height-computed
  color: $text-color
  z-index: 101
  box-shadow: $gray-lighter 2px 0 0
  +arrow($gray-lighter, #fff, "bottom", "out", 15px, 20px)

.popover__title
  font-size: 18px
  font-weight: $headings-font-weight
  margin-bottom: 12px

.popover__overlay
  position: fixed
  top: 0
  right: 0
  bottom: 0
  left: 0
  display: none
  z-index: 100
  background-color: transparentize($gray-base, 0.8)

// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover--left
  .popover__inner
    margin-left: -$popover-width+35px
    &::before
      left: auto
      right: 20px
    &::after
      left: auto
      right: 19px


// States
// --------------------------------------------------
.popover.is-open
  .popover__overlay
    display: block
    animation:
      name: popover-overlay
      duration: 500ms
      timing-function: ease-in-out
      iteration-count: 1
      fill-mode: forwards
  .popover__inner
    display: block
    transform-origin: bottom left
    animation:
      name: popover-inner
      duration: 500ms
      timing-function: ease-in-out
      iteration-count: 1
      fill-mode: forwards

@keyframes popover-inner
  0%
    opacity: 0
    bottom: 25%
    transform: scale(0.05) rotate(30deg) rotateX(-90deg)
  50%
    transform: rotate(-10deg) rotateX(-2deg)
  70%
    transform: rotate(3deg)
  100%
    opacity: 1
    bottom: 100%
    transform: scale(1)


@keyframes popover-overlay
  0%
    opacity: 0
  100%
    opacity: 1
section.renderMarkup:
Open popover
Popover title
Popover content

section.description: Button in various versions.
section.markup: Button
section.css:
// Component
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn
  background: transparent
  padding: 7px 20px 9px
  text-transform: uppercase
  font-family: $font-family-base
  font-weight: $font-weight-bold
  font-size: $font-size-base
  letter-spacing: 0.05em
  border: 2px solid
  border-radius: 20px
  white-space: nowrap
  cursor: pointer
  +btn-color($text-color)
  &:hover
    transition: color 250ms, border-color 250ms, background 250ms
    +btn-color(#fff, $text-color, $text-color)

button,
input[type="button"],
input[type="submit"]
  @extend .btn
  margin-top: 30px


// Modifiers
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--block
  width: 100%
  display: block
  max-width: none
  text-align: center

.btn--md
  padding: 11px 25px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--lg
  padding: 15px 25px
  border-radius: 30px

.btn--circle
  width: 48px
  height: 48px
  line-height: 48px
  padding: 0
  margin: -14px 0
  display: inline-block
  text-align: center
  border-radius: 50%
  +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
  &:hover
    +btn-color(#fff, $gray-base, $gray-base)

.btn--light
  +btn-color(#fff, #fff)
  &:hover
    +btn-color($text-color, #fff, #fff)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--primary
  +btn-color(#fff, $brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    font-weight: $font-weight-bold

.btn--link
  border: none
  padding-left: 0
  padding-right: 0
  +btn-color($brand-primary, $brand-primary)
  &:hover
    +btn-color($brand-primary)
    text-decoration: underline

.btn--disabled
  pointer-events: none
  opacity: 0.2


// Dependencies
// --------------------------------------------------
.btn--circle > .icon::before
  bottom: 0.40em
  right: -0.18em
  +icon-size(23px)
section.renderMarkup: Button

section.description: Layouts and page composition related elements
